columns.name: vpn_connection_id
columns.description: The ID of the VPN connection.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) specifying the VPN connection.

columns.name: state
columns.description: The current state of the VPN connection.

columns.name: category
columns.description: The category of the VPN connection. A value of VPN indicates an AWS VPN connection.

columns.name: vpn_gateway_id
columns.description: The ID of the virtual private gateway at the AWS side of the VPN connection.

columns.name: customer_gateway_id
columns.description: The ID of the customer gateway at your end of the VPN connection.

columns.name: customer_gateway_configuration
columns.description: The configuration information for the VPN connection's customer gateway.

columns.name: transit_gateway_id
columns.description: The ID of the transit gateway associated with the VPN connection.

columns.name: routes
columns.description: The static routes associated with the VPN connection.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: A list of tags that are attached to VPN gateway.
